TextView.android:text: Skin-Picking disorder)-- Persons with excoriation (skin-picking) disorder keep picking at their skin, resulting in significant sores or wounds (APA, 2013) hair-pulling disorder, also known as trichotillomania, repeatedly pull out hair from their scalp, eyebrows, eyelashes, or other parts of the body (APA, 2013, 2012). The disorder usually centers on just one or two of these body sites, most often the scalp. results to wounds and sores
